name: Dice Princess
description:
------- How to play -------

User WASD(or arrows) to control the character.
Use SPACE to use your  active power.

------- Goal -------
- On each level find a crystal before the end of the day and bring it to a ruins of your castle. 
- If you fail to get back in time, that's fine but you will be teleported to a new world and a location of your castle will be unknown!
- When you collect 6 crystals, you will have a chance to fight the Wizard!

Tip: You will hear a crystal when you are close by.

------- Synopsis -------

The Evil Wizard has destroyed your kingdom, and you and your castle have been bewitched!
Now, once a day, you will be teleported to a newly generated dimension.

Unfortunately, your powers are also inconsistent and changing between days.

However, there is a chance to fix everything:
 - In each new dimension there is a Crystal.
- Collect 6 of these crystals and bring them to the ruins of your castle and you will have the opportunity to fight the Wizard and return everything to its place!
